behavior_notes: Subterranean movement patterns; emerges at irregular intervals
notes: Difficult to observe; retreats before approach. No complete specimen obtained.

behavior_notes: Sessile for extended periods; sudden bursts of activity
diet_observed: Appears to filter particulates from muck
notes: Stone-like camouflage effective. Specimens captured in edge pools only.

behavior_notes: Collective movement in loose swarms; avoids direct light
notes: Abundant at Dens periphery. Swarm behavior well-documented.

behavior_notes: Burrowing in subaquatic muck; fins appear minerite
notes: Single specimen; rock-like fin structure unique. Deep habitat limits observation.

behavior_notes: Scavenging near settlements; nocturnal primarily
notes: Tucker of Capital provided specimen location. Well-documented in urban periphery.

behavior_notes: Pool-dwelling; rarely surfaces
notes: Kept in pools by local crews. No wild specimen obtained.

behavior_notes: Grazing behavior; slow-moving; gregarious
notes: Domesticated by edge settlements. Wild populations unconfirmed.

behavior_notes: Vocal at dusk; burrowing during day
notes: Distinctive pipe-like calls. Specimens readily captured.

behavior_notes: Flocking; roosts in scattered trees
notes: Common. Multiple specimens across years.

behavior_notes: Rapid scurrying; adheres to muck crust
notes: Surface-dwelling. Easy to capture when muck crust stable.

behavior_notes: Shifting movement; difficult to track
notes: Movement pattern defies prediction. No specimen captured.

behavior_notes: Wings flap unnoticeably; inhabits tunnel air currents
notes: Breathes tunneled air. Rare captures at tunnel mouths.

behavior_notes: Hibernating carriers; transports blocks during waking periods
notes: Report from Capeast expedition. No direct observation by compiler.

behavior_notes: Ligneous structure; slow-moving
notes: Woody shell burns as fuel. Single specimen preserved.

behavior_notes: Solitary; territorial
notes: No specimen - too dangerous. Leather used for garments.

behavior_notes: Aggressive; high activity periods
notes: Expedition reports only. Too dangerous for specimen collection.

behavior_notes: Aureate coloring; tracking behavior; gold with red spots
notes: Used for tracking by locals. Abundant specimens.

behavior_notes: Humanoid movement; unclear if creature or transformed person
notes: Unconfirmed. May represent transformed humans rather than distinct species.

behavior_notes: Avian characteristics with humanoid form
notes: Unconfirmed. Classification uncertain - creature or hybrid?

behavior_notes: Traverses muck efficiently; may be profession or creature type
notes: Term may describe profession rather than species. Requires field verification.

behavior_notes: Aquatic predator; twin-tailed propulsion
notes: Dreaded fish of Densworld. No specimen possible - too dangerous. Observation from distance only.

behavior_notes: Post-mortem companions; follow witch after death
notes: Supernatural category. Form of living thing that follows witch after death. Not suitable for taxonomic classification.

aliases: The Five / fivefold woman / hydra-like creature
behavior_notes: Five-in-one manifestation; prime-number voice patterns (2 3 5 7 11)
notes: Unique entity. Classification disputed - creature or persons? See Grigsu's Notebooks. Tortured with ciphers by The Torturer. Covered in densash.
